page.title: 13RECREATION- BARGOED DISTRICT
page.content: The L.E.A. offers many evening class facilities for adults and young people in Bargoed, Gilfach and Aberbargoed. At Gilfach the Y.M.C.A. caters for the Youth and Unemployed, and the Male Voice Choir rehearses at the school (local concerts are held at the Bargoed Central Hall). Open spaces, the mountain top and semi-woodland, provide interesting walks which are well sign-posted. To improve the environment, the Council Clean-up Campaign is running a photography competition. At Aberbargoed the Institute provides snooker and other activities. Many people subscribe to the Rhymney Valley Eisteddfod every July and also to the Rhymney Valley Arts Festival, annually.
